name: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coveralls Type 3

overview.title: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coveralls Type 3
overview.text: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coverall Type 3 is a high gram-weight composite nonwoven material, through cutting and sewing. Seams are covered with special heat sealing tape for protective clothing. The coating can isolate virus gas sol, virus-containing liquid. When taking off, the outer surface of the protective coverall is not in contact with the human body.

specifications.name: Medical Protective Coveralls Type 3
specifications.size: S-160CM, M-165CM, L-170CM, XL-175CM, XXL-180CM, XXXL-185CM

productDetail:
YHUK™ Medical Protective Coveralls Type 3

The product can be used in the places with higher level of protection e.g. ICU Isolation Approach.
The product conforms to EN 12126 EN 14605: 2005 and is certified by 'TUV SUD'.
The product conforms to GB 19082:2009. It is certified by 'Beijing Center for Quality Supervision and Inspection of Medical Devices, State Food and Drug Administration', a China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) listed testing laboratory.
The factory is certified by China National Medical Products Administration (NMPA).
The factory is certified for EN ISO 13485: 2016 by 'TUV SUD'.
The factory was founded in 2012.
